title: Would like to know if and when the city plans to take a serious look at the potholes, craters and sinkholes on Hawthorne, Gillette, South Oak Parkway, and South Churchill Drive.  Get no response from the city.  They are getting dangerous.  I drive a big Lincoln SUV, and sometimes I think my axle is in danger.  Cannot imagine driving around here in a standard car.
text:
Here's a link to information about street paving in Wilmington:



http://www.myreporter.com/2016/02/how-can-i-get-the-city-of-wilmington-to-pave-a-road/



A reporter will reach out to the city and see if they can get any further with them than you did!



As soon as an answer is posted, we'll send you an email with a link to the answer.
